name: Sniper Dodge
description:
Created in 3 hours for TriJam#211. The theme was Insane Accuracy.

You have important information to deliver to townhall to take down the mob but they're one step ahead of you and have setup a crack shot sniper in the town hall window.

Use the crowd to avoid the sniper's sightline and get to townhall ASAP!

This one was a simple concept that ended up being quite tough to implement.

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Dash
